title: Bonus Episode – Justice Delayed
description:
July 31, 2017 / Colin explores the right to a speedy trial by investigating the case of a North Carolina teenager in jail for over sixteen months awaiting a trial date. 

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Thank you to our sponsors! 
 
Start framing your photos or art today by going to www.framebridge.com/undisclosed to get an additional 15% off your first order!
 
Stamps.com has a special offer including 4-week trial  + postage + digital scale by going to www.stamps.com. Clickon the microphone at the top of the homepage and type in Undisclosed!

Check out this week’s menu and get your first 3 meals free and with free shipping! Just go to www.blueapron.com/undisclosed and start cooking!

#undisclosed
